Package au.csiro.pathling.errors

Class ErrorReportingInterceptor

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.errors.ErrorReportingInterceptor
@Component @Profile("server") public class ErrorReportingInterceptor extends Object
This class intercepts errors and reports them to Sentry.
Author:
John Grimes

    • reportErrorToSentry

      public void reportErrorToSentry(@Nullable RequestDetails requestDetails, @Nullable ServletRequestDetails servletRequestDetails, @Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, @Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, @Nullable BaseServerResponseException exception)
      HAPI hook to intercept errors and report them to Sentry.
      Parameters:
      requestDetails - the details of the request (HAPI)
      servletRequestDetails - further details of the request (HAPI)
      request - the details of the request (Servlet API)
      response - the response that will be sent
      exception - the exception that was caught

    • isReportableException

      public static boolean isReportableException(@Nonnull BaseServerResponseException exception)
      Checks if the exception constitutes an unexpected error (as opposed to a user input error) that should be reported for investigation (e.g. to Sentry). We only want to report 500 series errors, not errors such as resource not found and bad request.
      Parameters:
      exception - the exception to test
      Returns:
      true if the exception should be reported, false otherwise

    • getReportableError

      @Nonnull public static Throwable getReportableError(@Nonnull BaseServerResponseException exception)
      Gets the root cause exception from the server BaseServerResponseException.
      Parameters:
      exception - the exception to extracts the root cause from.
      Returns:
      the root cause of this exception.

    • reportExceptionToSentry

      public static void reportExceptionToSentry(@Nonnull BaseServerResponseException exception)
      Reports the exception to Sentry if reportable.
      Parameters:
      exception - the exception to be reported.
